We are guest-editing a topical collection on "Reproducible Research in Transportation" for [European Transport Research Review (ETRR)](https://etrr.springeropen.com/), a peer-reviewed open access journal.

## Collection Scope

- Original high-quality scholarly research on reproducible practices
- Transportation science, technologies, policy, and practice
- Best practices and case studies in open science
- Tools and methodologies for reproducibility
